shortdesc.ph: 通过音乐资源编号打开音乐资源。

p.codeblock: virtual int open(int64_t songCode, int64_t startPos = 0) = 0;
abstract openWithSongCode(songCode: number, startPos?: number): number;
public abstract int Open(Int64 songCode, Int64 startPos);
abstract openWithSongCode(songCode: number, startPos?: number): number;
Future<void> openWithSongCode({required int songCode, int startPos = 0});

section.title: Details
section.note: If the music you want to open is protected by Digital Rights Management(DRM), you need to call this method to open the music. For music that are not DRM protected, you can either call this method or method for opening.
section.p: Before calling this method, make sure the music you want to play has been preloaded. 你可以调用 方法来检测音乐资源是否已被预加载，或通过 回调得知。

plentry.pd: The code of the music, which is an unique identifier of the music.
The starting position (ms) for playback. Default value is 0.

section.p: When the method call succeeds, there is no return value; when fails, the exception is thrown; you need to catch the exception and handle it accordingly.
